com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal

Class SealOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal.SealOptions

  • public class SealOptions
extends Object
    Parameters for specifying the input seal options required for PDFElectronicSealOptions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SealOptions.Builder
      Builds a SealOptions instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SealAppearanceOptions getSealAppearanceOptions()
      Returns the SealAppearanceOptions instance containing information regarding elements to be displayed in Seal Field.
      SealCredentialOptions getSealCredentialOptions()
      Returns the SealCredentialOptions instance containing information regarding Certificate Credentials.
      SealFieldOptions getSealFieldOptions()
      Returns the SealFieldOptions instance containing information regarding Seal Field Position in PDF Document.
      SignatureFormat getSignatureFormat()
      Returns the intended signature format to be used for applying electronic seal.
